mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYCART (user_id, item_id, quantity, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{itemId}, #{quantity}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.user_id, c.item_id, c.quantity, c.created_at, c.updated_at, i.title AS ITEM_TITLE, i.price AS ITEM_PRICE, im.filename AS ITEM_IMAGE FROM mycart c JOIN items i ON c.item_id = i.id LEFT JOIN item_images im ON i.id = im.item_id AND im.sort_order = 1 WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
